Basic.name: Core Hound
Basic.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

Basic.name: Flamestrike
Basic.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
Basic.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Basic.name: Guardian of Kings
Basic.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

Basic.name: Stormwind Champion
Basic.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

Basic.name: War Golem
Basic.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

Classic.name: Ancient of Lore
Classic.text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore 5 Health.
Classic.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

Classic.name: Ancient of War
Classic.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

Classic.name: Archmage Antonidas
Classic.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
Classic.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

Classic.name: Baron Geddon
Classic.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
Classic.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

Classic.name: Gladiator's Longbow
Classic.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

Classic.name: Gorehowl
Classic.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
Classic.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

Classic.name: Prophet Velen
Classic.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
Classic.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

Classic.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
Classic.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

Naxxramas.name: Locust Swarm
Naxxramas.text: Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #3 Health to your hero.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Crush
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Dr. Boom
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Flame Leviathan
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gahz'rilla
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Malorne
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Neptulon
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Troggzor the Earthinator
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Rend Blackhand
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

The Grand Tournament.name: Acidmaw
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

The Grand Tournament.name: Captured Jormungar
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

The Grand Tournament.name: Chillmaw
The Grand Tournament.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

The Grand Tournament.name: Confessor Paletress
The Grand Tournament.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

The Grand Tournament.name: Eadric the Pure
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions' Attack to 1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

The Grand Tournament.name: Fearsome Doomguard
The Grand Tournament.flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

The Grand Tournament.name: Knight of the Wild
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

The Grand Tournament.name: Skycap'n Kragg
The Grand Tournament.text: Charrrrrge Costs (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

The League of Explorers.name: Everyfin is Awesome
The League of Explorers.text:
Give your minions +2/+2.
Costs (1) less for each Murloc you control.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Obsidian Destroyer
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
The League of Explorers.flavor: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Bog Creeper
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Cho'gall
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Malkorok
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

Karazhan.name: Black Queen
Karazhan.text: Auto-Attack: Deal 4 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

Karazhan.name: Firelands Portal
Karazhan.text:
Deal $5 damage. Summon a random
5-Cost minion.
Karazhan.flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: The Curator
Karazhan.text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
Karazhan.flavor: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: White Queen
Karazhan.text: Auto-Attack: Deal 4 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

Credits.name: Dean Ayala
Credits.text: You can't lose stars while this is in your deck.

Credits.name: Hamilton Chu
Credits.text: Was successfully NOT part of the problem! ...most of the time.

Credits.name: JC Park
Credits.text: Battlecry: Add a new platform for Hearthstone.
